title: Partners
resume: A half-hour, multi-camera comedy centered on the newly established partnership of high-end elitist lawyer Allen Braddock and for-the-people, ethics driven lawyer Marcus Jackson. When a court ordered sanction teams Allen Braddock with Marcus Jackson in hopes that some of Marcus' conscience will rub off, the two find themselves in a partnership nature never intended.
